title: Shaco bug?
body:
After using Q to stealth past an enemy sometimes Shaco will attack them and break stealth.

Auto attack is disabled and I definitely did not click on them.

I don't know what causes it. Maybe left clicking on the enemy to cast deceive? I haven't tested.

It happens rarely. Once or twice I thought I clicked on them by accident, but the last time it happened I clicked nowhere near them.

replies.body: Make sure u dont bump shift it makes you attack.
Has happened to me, but as you say, it's very rare, most of the times it's us accidentally clicking them. or holding rmb over them.
